## TemporalRangesTariffSchedule.matches() method

Find the rules that apply on a given date, repsecting the `multipleMatch` property.

**Signature:**

```typescript
matches(date: Date, utc?: boolean): TemporalRangesTariff[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  date | Date | the date to find the matching rules at |
|  utc | boolean | _(Optional)_ if <code>true</code> then use UTC date components, otherwise assume the local time zone |

**Returns:**

[TemporalRangesTariff](./nifty-tou.temporalrangestariff.md)<!-- -->\[\]

the list of matching rules; at most one if `multipleMatch` is `false`
